title: Clubs still broken after fix (riot wont reply or help)
body: i am the leader of my club and i cant log in to my club on my client it says im not even in a club and on my phone i can log on but cant make any adjustments i cant even leave or make promotions and this is after they supposedly fixed them. i have tried repairing client to no avail i got someone to invite my smurf and it works perfectly fine on that account but not my main/leader account i have submitted ticket but riot will not replay

replies.body: ya they just responded to my ticket about 2 days ago and asked for club info i wonder if just the leaders are affected

There were some hiccups with the clubs re-enable that we're looking into. Since you've submitted a ticket, I suggest sitting tight until a specialist can take a look into this with you. Just as a heads-up, response times are a bit longer than normal due to a large influx of tickets submitted recently.

Let me know if you have any questions.
